content.text: Hello! I love going to concerts. I don't know much about music, but it's fun to go with my boss and dance.
I love going to concerts too! I'm a truck driver so I don't get to do it often, but I always have a great time.
That's awesome! I'm currently pursuing my law degree and I'm always worried that I won't be able to keep up with my busy schedule.
I'm sure you'll be able to do it! I'm a creative person from the Midwest who loves to make clothes and play music, so I know how it feels to have a lot on your plate.
Thanks! That's reassuring. I also love spending time with my new love, whom I love to drive around with on long winding roads.
That sounds amazing! I love nature, so I'd love to go on a long drive with someone I love.
It's really great. I'm glad we're getting to know each other.
Me too! I think we could be good friends.
